TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XPathItem extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents an item in the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.

span.span: Represents an item in the XQuery 1.0 and XPath 2.0 Data Model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目是節點或不可部分完成的值。An item is either a node or an atomic value.

span.para:
當您繼承自類別，您必須覆寫下列成員： :-

When you inherit from the class, you must override the following members: : -

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生的類別建構函式來初始化此類型中的狀態會呼叫這個建構函式。This constructor is called by derived class constructors to initialize state in this type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsNode As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsNode { bool get(); };

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the item represents an XPath node or an atomic value.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the item represents an XPath node or an atomic value.

value.span: 如果項目表示 XPath 節點。如果該項目代表不可部分完成的值。

span.span: if the item represents an XPath node; if the item represents an atomic value.

public: abstract property System::Object ^ TypedValue { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to its schema type.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type according to its schema type.

value.span: 目前的項目為最適當的 boxed 物件 [！INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 類型。

span.span: The current item as a boxed object of the most appropriate [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果項目的值無效，無法根據指定的結構描述類型，值屬性就相當於值屬性。If the value of the item is not valid according to its specified schema type, the value of the property is equivalent to the value of the property. 如需有關型別支援命名空間，請參閱[System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

public: abstract property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the value of the item.

summary.span: Returns the item's value as the specified type.

span.span: Returns the item's value as the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當在衍生類別中覆寫方法會嘗試將此值的項目轉換[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]指定型別。When overridden in a derived class, the method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified.

summary.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the item's value as the type specified using the object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the item's value as the type specified using the object specified to resolve namespace prefixes.

returns.span: The value of the item as the type requested.

span.span: The value of the item as the type requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當在衍生類別中覆寫方法會嘗試將此值的項目轉換[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]指定型別。When overridden in a derived class, the method attempts to convert the value of the item to the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type specified. 物件用來解析與型別轉換相關的命名空間前置詞。The object is used to resolve namespace prefixes related to type conversions. 例如，當轉換`xs:QName`至`xs:string`。For example, when converting an `xs:QName` to an `xs:string`. 如需有關型別支援命名空間，請參閱[System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

exception.span: The attempted cast is not valid.

span.span: The attempted cast is not valid.

exception.span: The attempted cast resulted in an overflow.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] type of the item.
The [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the item.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當在衍生類別中覆寫屬性會取得[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]項目的具類型值的類型。When overridden in a derived class, the property gets the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] type of the typed value of the item. 例如，類型的元素`xs:int`必須的預設。For example, an element of type `xs:int` would have a of by default. 不過，可以是任何一種可以對應到有效型別`xs:int`，例如或。However, the could be any one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as or . 如需有關型別支援命名空間，請參閱[System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)。For more information about type support in the namespace, see [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md).

span.para: 所有實作者必須提供屬性對於每個項目，即使它是只。
All implementers must provide a property for every item, even if it is only .
